##########
Kido Test
##########

Goal
====

Provide code snippets which help running tests in Django.

Installation
============

.. code-block:: console

   pip install django-kidotest

or current development version:

.. code-block:: console

   pip install hg+https:://bitbucket.org/kidosoft/django-kidotest

Configuration
=============

Sample:

.. code-block:: python

   INSTALLED_APPS =  [
    ...
    'kidotest',
    ...
   ]
